website_summaries.verdict: A good standard toaster oven that includes some nice extra features.
pros: Features three knobs that are easy to use
Includes broil, keep warm, bake, toast, and bagel options
The bagel function toasts the cut side and warms the round side
Fits four slices of toast or a 9-inch pizza
cons: You have to lift the crumb tray to get it out to clean and that can cause some crumbs to fall back into the oven

customer_reviews.title: OK, except for big temperature overshoot
customer_reviews.text: The oven works alright, but the 'bake' mode has a big overshoot problem. On the initial heat-up, it will overshoot the requested temperature by as much as 100% (I measured as high as 500F when I set the oven to bake at 250F). After this initial overshoot and cool down, the oven does a reasonable job maintaining the requested temperature (it's a simple hysteresis controller. The hysteresis amount seems to be about +/-10 degrees F). This initial overshoot is probably tolerable for most food uses. However I am using this oven to reflow solder PCBs, so the overshoot is quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot on outside, but otherwise great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this little toaster oven. I read a lot of the reviews before buying it, and was made aware that it gets hot on the outside, but have no problem keeping it away from stuff when in use. I can recommend it to those who take care with it's operation.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvFMyers

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a larger toaster oven first hoping it could do the things this little toaster does so well. We had to wait almost two months for this but it was well worth the wait. It is a nice size and does not seem overpowering on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Nice safety feature
customer_reviews.text: I like the oven. I like the safety feature that prevents "stay on" mode unless you squeeze the safety release on the dial. My old toaster oven did't have that feature and I accidentally left it on a couple of times - I'm glad I noticed it both times. One disappointment is the tray does not automatically slide out when you open the door.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: It’s simple, basic & does the job
customer_reviews.text: After going through 2 pricy toaster ovens over the past year we gave this basic unit a shot and we’re surprisingly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst t.o. I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned it but kept trying different rack positions, temperatures, etc. It still doesn't heat or toast uniformly, everything comes out partly overcooked and partly undercooked -- sure it was one of the least expensive, but my previous Black&Decker toaster oven (retired after more than 10 years) cost less, had fewer bells and whistles, but always worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: A toaster oven that can do so much! I really like it; it fits in the space I had planned to put it in and looks great. The controls are easy to use and the booklet is really helpful. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Its a better than average toaster
customer_reviews.text: PRO: Bagel setting. CON: Small font used for settings. Overall: Its a better than average toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Marrone

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is small enough for me to put it on a slide out shelf when I am not using it. It works well but the recommendation for toast is wrong. It says to toast at 450 deg. but that just burns the outside and leaves the inside spongy. Set the temp at 350 for toasting, it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: I would never recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: As yet has it has not impressed me, very uneven toasting! Half burnt on one side and the same side not toasted at all! I would never recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE ANGLACE

customer_reviews.title: I like the three dial settings and all the options they ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the three dial settings and all the options they provide. Doesn't take up too much counter space but fits everything in for daily use in heating and reheating tiems.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, Good. Works great and has multiple settings for baking, toast, bagels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sturdy product based on original first uses.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the shelf positioning slots. One low, one high, it needs a third one at mid-level for use as a small oven.
customer_reviews.author: hankjeff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for several months and works well
customer_reviews.author: Kim RN

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Seems like all toaster ovens no matter the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Seems like all toaster ovens no matter the price are a crap shoot. 4 stars because the older model of this same toaster looked better with the stainless... newer version has a cheaper plastic looking brushed chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Avery

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality. Don’t purchase this Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: The timer stopped working less than four weeks of use. The temperature control is not good. You have to watch whatever you cook in it because if not, it WILL burn.
customer_reviews.author: dale machado

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: bought this so my sons can heat or toast things up after school. Trying to get away from the microwave a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia W. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good little toaster
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom. She likes it. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Radi

customer_reviews.title: We love Hamilton Beach Toaster Ovens
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the camper, works great! We have the larger one in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Steve Weingart

customer_reviews.title: No headache to learn to use
customer_reviews.text: Hey it's me low tech klutz again. The product is simple easy to operate easy to adjust temperature control. You don't have to go to a science class to operate this thing and it doesn't take all day to learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Too uneven for me...
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the comments posted by stevendavid2000, except that the uneven toasting is far more important to me than it is to him. After all, this is a TOASTER. If you want the middle of your bread to have any color at all, you have to burn the edges. Even when used as an oven, the center strip protecting the upper heating element prevents that area of the food from cooking properly.
customer_reviews.author: JMom

customer_reviews.title: Heated very unevenly -- burned waffles on bottom. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Heated very unevenly -- burned waffles on bottom. I returned it for another (much more expensive) brand which works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Crumb drawer lifts up dumping crumbs back into toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Toaster works great and bought it specifically for the bagel option which toasts just the top. The main downside of this toaster is to empty the crumb tray you have to lift it up and pull out through the door (oppose to a drawer on the bottom) so a few crumbs tend to fall back into the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: With temperatures always high here in the California desert it is very important to keep the house cool. That means no traditional oven cooking. I utilize this toaster as my regular oven. It cooks evenly and quickly. I have had it for about 6 months now and it's going strong.
customer_reviews.author: sarpyfamily

customer_reviews.title: Good product - good price
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of toasting and baking; that is the most important aspect. The cost is low. The dials are hard to read for a senior citizen because they are black on gray. The baking pan is not porcelain or other pure metal, so I invested in another one.
customer_reviews.author: Carolhoney

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I like the small footprint and the even cooking when toasting & broiling. However, I do not like how you have to use the rack and the tray together. My little finger mitts will not work with this toaster oven because it's too thick to grab. Had to go back to pot holder, which is dangerous when you are broiling!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not good at toasting
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't make decent toast with this. At the medium toast setting, it left a wide untoasted area down the middle of the slice. If I set the machine just a little higher, the middle area would be only slightly brown and the outer areas black. I think the machine is badly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Claude R

customer_reviews.title: Works great but controls needlessly confusing
customer_reviews.text: Works great but controls needlessly confusing. Yes, a toaster oven, which should be basic and mindless to operate. Also not quite deep enough for a standard dinner plate.
customer_reviews.author: Yrofthetiger

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size (not a counter gobbler by any means) and so far, heats very nicely and accurately. It's attractive, has nice self-explanatory controls, and the price was right. I hope it lasts at least half as long as my 20 year old Magic Chef did.
customer_reviews.author: OlderWiserReader

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely stopped working 35 days after purchase!!! No indicator light, no element heating. Horrible waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Versatile appliance
customer_reviews.text: I finally switched from my trusty toaster to this toaster oven. Now realizing how many different uses it provides in contrast to my toaster. Instructions for use are clear and simple. I have baked, toasted and warmed in it so far. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Works fine so far, just not very large as shown in picture, but a great little toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I expected, but works well for heating up small things. Can complain and has a BAGEL setting i love!
customer_reviews.author: lafftoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Old toaster oven died after 12 years. Hope this one lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected. Does the job though
customer_reviews.author: faztang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. Worth the price I paid and works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M

customer_reviews.title: Good price but
customer_reviews.text: I’m not wild about how the knobs work. you have to work /turn and set more than one to get it to toast .
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this little oven. It really does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: The Flower Nurse

customer_reviews.title: but overall i really like this toaster
customer_reviews.text: wish it cane with two pans, but overall i really like this toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an old defective black and decker. I’m happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Plescia

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 31142 Toaster Oven, 12.2 x 9.6 x 16.14 inches, Silver
product_meta.description: Perfectly sized to fit a 9 inch pizza, but not too big to be a countertop mainstay, the Hamilton Beach Toaster Oven's five cooking settings gives you the flexibility to make just about anything. Toast, bake, warm, and broil a variety of foods. You can also toast bagels to perfection - a special setting toasts just the cut side of the bagel and warms the round side.
feature_bullets: Bagel function - toasts the cut side and warms the round side
5 functions - broil, keep warm, bake, bagel, and toast

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars226 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
